attributes.action: Officially recognise Birmingham as the second city of the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is aimed at confirming officially that the city of Birmingham is the United Kingdoms second city.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Officially recognise Birmingham as the second city of the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14817.asp

Prime Minister's Office
